languages.text: "Утверждение истинно. Я попала в свиту Лорд-инквизитора и была допущена к исследованию опасного артефакта, отобранного у Амарната. Он попытался оказать на меня некое влияние, но цифровые обеты защитили меня..." {n}Нихель Ханейманн касается обожженого лица.{/n} "Замыкание пробудило некоторую часть воспоминаний. Я провела анализ, решила дилемму Эсхатоса и начала действовать".

"This statement is true. I was admitted into the Lord Inquisitor's retinue and authorised to study a dangerous artefact taken from Amarnat. It tried to exert some kind of influence on me, but my data-vows protected me..." {n}Nihel Haneumann touches her scarred face.{/n} "A short circuit awakened some of my memories. I conducted an analysis, solved the Eschatos dilemma, and began to act."
languages.original_text: "Утверждение истинно. Я попала в свиту Лорд-инквизитора и была допущена к исследованию опасного артефакта, отобранного у Амарната. Он попытался оказать на меня некое влияние, но цифровые обеты защитили меня..." {n}Нихель Ханейманн касается обожженого лица.{/n} "Замыкание пробудило некоторую часть воспоминаний. Я провела анализ, решила дилемму Эсхатоса и начала действовать".

It tried to exert some kind of influence on me, but my data-vows protected me..." {n}Nihel Haneumann touches her burn-scarred face.{/n} "A short circuit awakened some of my memories. I conducted an analysis, solved the Eschatos dilemma, and began to act."
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: 「その発言は正しい。ロード・インクィジターの従者として認められた私は、アマルナトが持ち去った危険なアーティファクトを調査する権限を得た。アマルナトは私に何らかの影響を与えようとしたが、私のデータの誓いに守られた…」{n}ニヘル・ヘニュマンは傷跡のある己の顔に触れる。{/n}「ショートしたことで記憶が呼び起こされたのだ。私は解析を実行し、エスカトのジレンマを解いて行動を開始した」
languages.original_text: "This statement is true. I was admitted into the Lord Inquisitor's retinue and authorised to study a dangerous artefact taken from Amarnat. It tried to exert some kind of influence on me, but my data-vows protected me..." {n}Nihel Haneumann touches her scarred face.{/n} "A short circuit awakened some of my memories. I conducted an analysis, solved the Eschatos dilemma, and began to act."

traits.locale_text: 「その発言は正しい。ロード・インクィジターの従者として認められた私は、アマルナトが持ち去った危険なアーティファクトを調査する権限を得た。アマルナトは私に何らかの影響を与えようとしたが、私のデータの誓いに守られた…」{n}ニヘル・ヘニュマンは傷跡のある己の顔に触れる。{/n}「ショートしたことで記憶が呼び起こされたのだ。私は解析を実行し、エスカトのジレンマを解いて行動を開始した」
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: “这种说法是正确的。我成为了大审判官的随从，获得授权，得以研究某件从阿玛纳特手中拿走的危险造物。那件造物试图对我施加某种影响，但我的数字誓约保护了我……”{n}妮赫尔·哈努曼摸了摸她伤痕累累的脸。{/n}“那场短路唤醒了我的部分记忆。我进行了分析，解决了终焉审判的困境，并开始采取行动。”
languages.original_text: "This statement is true. I was admitted into the Lord Inquisitor's retinue and authorised to study a dangerous artefact taken from Amarnat. It tried to exert some kind of influence on me, but my data-vows protected me..." {n}Nihel Haneumann touches her scarred face.{/n} "A short circuit awakened some of my memories. I conducted an analysis, solved the Eschatos dilemma, and began to act."

traits.locale_text: “这种说法是正确的。我成为了审判长的随从，获得授权，得以研究某件从阿玛纳特手中拿走的危险造物。那件造物试图对我施加某种影响，但我的数字誓约保护了我……”{n}雅珀·哈努曼摸了摸她伤痕累累的脸。{/n}“那场短路唤醒了我的部分记忆。我进行了分析，解决了终焉审判的困境，并开始采取行动。”
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: « Cette affirmation est exacte. Après avoir été admise dans l'entourage du seigneur inquisiteur, j'ai été autorisée à étudier un dangereux artefact d'Amarnat. Il a tenté de m'influencer, mais mes serments m'ont protégée... » {n}Nihel Haneumann effleure son visage défiguré par des brûlures.{/n} « J'ai retrouvé une partie de la mémoire suite à un court-circuit. J'ai alors effectué une analyse, résolu le dilemme d'Eschatos et décidé de passer à l'action. »
languages.original_text: "This statement is true. I was admitted into the Lord Inquisitor's retinue and authorised to study a dangerous artefact taken from Amarnat. It tried to exert some kind of influence on me, but my data-vows protected me..." {n}Nihel Haneumann touches her scarred face.{/n} "A short circuit awakened some of my memories. I conducted an analysis, solved the Eschatos dilemma, and began to act."

traits.locale_text: « Cette affirmation est exacte. Après avoir été admise dans l'entourage du seigneur inquisiteur, j'ai été autorisée à étudier un dangereux artefact d'Amarnat. Il a tenté de m'influencer, mais mes serments m'ont protégée... » {n}Nihel Haneumann effleure son visage défiguré par des brûlures.{/n} « J'ai retrouvé une partie de la mémoire suite à un court-circuit. J'ai alors effectué une analyse, résolu le dilemme d'Eschatos et décidé de passer à l'action. »
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: «Esta declaración es verdadera. Me aceptaron en el séquito del Lord Inquisidor y me autorizaron a estudiar el peligroso artefacto que le retiraron a Amarnat. Intentó ejercer algún tipo de influencia en mí, pero mis juramentos de datos me protegieron...». {n}Nihel Haneumann toca su rostro lleno de cicatrices.{/n} «Después de un cortocircuito, mis recuerdos despertaron. Realicé un análisis, resolví el dilema de Eschatos, y comencé a actuar».
languages.original_text: "This statement is true. I was admitted into the Lord Inquisitor's retinue and authorised to study a dangerous artefact taken from Amarnat. It tried to exert some kind of influence on me, but my data-vows protected me..." {n}Nihel Haneumann touches her scarred face.{/n} "A short circuit awakened some of my memories. I conducted an analysis, solved the Eschatos dilemma, and began to act."

traits.locale_text: «Esta declaración es verdadera. Me aceptaron en el séquito del Lord Inquisidor y me autorizaron a estudiar el peligroso artefacto que le retiraron a Amarnat. Intentó ejercer algún tipo de influencia en mí, pero mis juramentos de datos me protegieron...». {n}Nihel Haneumann toca su rostro lleno de cicatrices.{/n} «Después de un cortocircuito, mis recuerdos despertaron. Realicé un análisis, resolví el dilema de Eschatos, y comencé a actuar».
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: "Diese Aussage ist korrekt. Ich wurde in das Gefolge des Großinquisitors aufgenommen und erhielt die Genehmigung ein gefährliches Artefakt zu studieren, das Amarnat weggenommen worden war. Es hat versucht, Einfluss auf mich auszuüben, doch meine Datengelübde haben mich beschützt ..." {n}Nihel Haneumann berührt ihr vernarbtes Gesicht.{/n} "Ein Kurzschluss hat einige meiner Erinnerungen geweckt. Ich habe eine Analyse durchgeführt, das Eschatos-Dilemma gelöst und begonnen zu handeln."
languages.original_text: "This statement is true. I was admitted into the Lord Inquisitor's retinue and authorised to study a dangerous artefact taken from Amarnat. It tried to exert some kind of influence on me, but my data-vows protected me..." {n}Nihel Haneumann touches her scarred face.{/n} "A short circuit awakened some of my memories. I conducted an analysis, solved the Eschatos dilemma, and began to act."

traits.locale_text: "Diese Aussage ist korrekt. Ich wurde in das Gefolge des Großinquisitors aufgenommen und erhielt die Genehmigung ein gefährliches Artefakt zu studieren, das Amarnat weggenommen worden war. Es hat versucht, Einfluss auf mich auszuüben, doch meine Datengelübde haben mich beschützt ..." {n}Nihel Haneumann berührt ihr vernarbtes Gesicht.{/n} "Ein Kurzschluss hat einige meiner Erinnerungen geweckt. Ich habe eine Analyse durchgeführt, das Eschatos-Dilemma gelöst und begonnen zu handeln."
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: "Bu önerme doğru. Lord Engizisyoncu'nun maiyetine atandım ve Amarnat'tan alınan tehlikeli bir eser üzerinde çalışma izni elde ettim. Eser, üzerimde nüfuz elde etmeye çalıştı. Veri yeminlerim beni korudu." {n}Nihel Haneumann, yaralı yüzüne dokunuyor.{/n} "Bir kısa devre sonucu hafızalarımın bir kısmı uyandı. Analiz yaptım, Eskatos ikilemini çözdüm ve eyleme geçtim."
languages.original_text: "This statement is true. I was admitted into the Lord Inquisitor's retinue and authorised to study a dangerous artefact taken from Amarnat. It tried to exert some kind of influence on me, but my data-vows protected me..." {n}Nihel Haneumann touches her scarred face.{/n} "A short circuit awakened some of my memories. I conducted an analysis, solved the Eschatos dilemma, and began to act."

traits.locale_text: "Bu önerme doğru. Lord Engizisyoncu'nun maiyetine atandım ve Amarnat'tan alınan tehlikeli bir eser üzerinde çalışma izni elde ettim. Eser, üzerimde nüfuz elde etmeye çalıştı ancak veri yeminlerim beni korudu." {n}Nihel Haneumann yaralı yüzüne dokunuyor.{/n} "Bir kısa devre nedeniyle hafızalarımdan bir kısmı uyandı. Bir analiz gerçekleştirdim, Eschatos ikilemini çözdüm ve eyleme geçtim."
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper
